mapper.sql: ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_TYPE, CHK_ACT_NO, CLEAR_DATE, CHNL_ID, CHNL_DATE, CHNL_SEQ, TRAN_DATE, TELLER_SEQ, TRAN_STAT, PLAT_DATE, PLAT_SEQ, TRANS_CODE, BRCH_NO, TELLER_NO, CURR_NO, ACCT_NO, OTH_ACCT_NO, TRANS_AMT, CHK_FLAG, CHK_BATCH_NO, CHK_DATE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, BANK_FLAG, INOUT_FLAG, ACCT_NAME, REL_ACCT_NAME, FEE_AMT
mapper.insert:
insert into
ID,
ORG_CODE,
ORG_TYPE,
CHK_ACT_NO,
CLEAR_DATE,
CHNL_ID,
CHNL_DATE,
CHNL_SEQ,
TRAN_DATE,
TELLER_SEQ,
TRAN_STAT,
PLAT_DATE,
PLAT_SEQ,
TRANS_CODE,
BRCH_NO,
TELLER_NO,
CURR_NO,
ACCT_NO,
OTH_ACCT_NO,
TRANS_AMT,
CHK_FLAG,
CHK_BATCH_NO,
CHK_DATE,
RESERVE1,
RESERVE2,
BANK_FLAG,
INOUT_FLAG,
ACCT_NAME,
REL_ACCT_NAME,
FEE_AMT,
#{id},
#{orgCode},
#{orgType},
#{chkActNo},
#{clearDate},
#{chnlId},
#{chnlDate},
#{chnlSeq},
#{tranDate},
#{tellerSeq},
#{tranStat},
#{platDate},
#{platSeq},
#{transCode},
#{brchNo},
#{tellerNo},
#{currNo},
#{acctNo},
#{othAcctNo},
#{transAmt},
#{chkFlag},
#{chkBatchNo},
#{chkDate},
#{reserve1},
#{reserve2},
#{bankFlag},
#{inoutFlag},
#{acctName},
#{relAcctName},
#{feeAmt},
mapper.update:
update
ID=#{id},
ORG_CODE=#{orgCode},
ORG_TYPE=#{orgType},
CHK_ACT_NO=#{chkActNo},
CLEAR_DATE=#{clearDate},
CHNL_ID=#{chnlId},
CHNL_DATE=#{chnlDate},
CHNL_SEQ=#{chnlSeq},
TRAN_DATE=#{tranDate},
TELLER_SEQ=#{tellerSeq},
TRAN_STAT=#{tranStat},
PLAT_DATE=#{platDate},
PLAT_SEQ=#{platSeq},
TRANS_CODE=#{transCode},
BRCH_NO=#{brchNo},
TELLER_NO=#{tellerNo},
CURR_NO=#{currNo},
ACCT_NO=#{acctNo},
OTH_ACCT_NO=#{othAcctNo},
TRANS_AMT=#{transAmt},
CHK_FLAG=#{chkFlag},
CHK_BATCH_NO=#{chkBatchNo},
CHK_DATE=#{chkDate},
RESERVE1=#{reserve1},
RESERVE2=#{reserve2},
BANK_FLAG=#{bankFlag},
INOUT_FLAG=#{inoutFlag},
ACCT_NAME=#{acctName},
REL_ACCT_NAME=#{relAcctName},
FEE_AMT= #{feeAmt},
where ID=#{id}
